item.title: How debugers work
item.description: Debuger and Compiler are common tools for all developers. But I notice that there was too few information about how a debuger works compared to how a compiler works. Today, I will introduce you the principles of debuggers in linux1 in a simple way. Before we start, let’s remain what a debuger can do: Start a new process or attach to a existing process Block process’s execution at any point Read or write process’s private data Writing a linux debugger ↩︎
